Description.Name: Mech Bay 4
Description.Details: With the Argo's power systems fully online, and enough reinforcement to keep the active Bays from damaging the ship's spine, six more 'Mech cubicles can be powered up and put to work. CAN BE BUGGY, BUYER BEWARE.

AssignedCastDescription: The power's back on to the rest of the Mech Bay, and we can start repairs on the last six cubicles. Even if you don't want to fill them with 'Mechs, believe me, I can put the extra space to good use. It's gonna take a shitload of work, though.
